Passaic.Ridgefield Park High School:
Ridgefield Park High School is a six-year comprehensive community public high school that serves students in seventh through twelfth grade from Ridgefield Park, in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States, operating as the lone secondary school of the Ridgefield Park Public Schools.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the school had an enrollment of 1,258 students and 94.0 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 13.4:1. There were 379 students (30.1% of enrollment) eligible for free lunch and 118 (9.4% of students) eligible for reduced-cost lunch.
